generated_doNotEdit.title: Dragonstrafeplayer Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to fly around looking for a player to shoot fireballs at. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

fields.title: Active Speed
fields.description: The speed this entity moves when this behavior has started or while it's active.

fields.title: Fireball Range
fields.description: Maximum distance of this entity's fireball attack while strafing.

fields.title: Flight Speed
fields.description: The speed this entity moves while this behavior is not active.

fields.title: Switch Direction Probability
fields.description: Percent chance to to switch this entity's strafe direction between clockwise and counterclockwise. Switch direction chance occurs each time a new target is chosen (1.0 = 100%).

fields.title: Target In Range And In View Time
fields.description: Time (in seconds) the target must be in fireball range, and in view [ie, no solid terrain in-between the target and this entity], before a fireball can be shot.

fields.title: Target Zone
fields.description: Minimum and maximum distance, from the target, this entity can use this behavior.

fields.title: Turn Speed
fields.description: The speed at which this entity turns while using this behavior.

fields.title: View Angle
fields.description: The target must be within "view_angle" degrees of the dragon's current rotation before a fireball can be shot.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
